item.title: recover from mysql XA transaction issues
item.description: In the past 2-3 weeks, I encountered an issue that I couldnâ€™t add a column to a table in one of our production database. I thought restart would resolve the issue. In the first gooogle search result page, How to Deal with XA Transactions Recovery caught my attention.
